Uses of Package
metaface.interaction

Packages that use metaface.interaction
metaface.client   
metaface.interaction   
metaface.server   
 

Classes in metaface.interaction used by metaface.client
DMTLParser
          DMTLParser takes DMTL documents and transforms them into an internal storage format (KnowledgeBase).
 

Classes in metaface.interaction used by metaface.interaction
BestList
          This class keeps a list of the best matching DMTL states to a user's stimulus
DefaultTopic
          This class store the DMTL default topic element and all of the subsequent states.
Evaluate
          This class provides evaluate actions within a DMTL knowledge base
InteractionContext
          A utility class for keeping the current interaction context
KnowledgeBase
          This class is an internal representation of a DMTL document.
NextState
          This class is based on the DMTL nextstate element and represents a state that must be searched in the following interaction
PreState
          This class is based on the DMTL prestate element and represents a state that must have been given as a response in order to access this state during interaction
Response
          This class provides a response to a user's interaction with natural language or hypertext
Signal
          This class provides a signal to application code once a state is given as a response
State
          This class provides an abstract basis for DMTL State elements.
Stimulus
          This state reoresents a DMTL stimulus element for matching to a user's stimulus.
SubTopic
          This clas represents a subtopic DMTL element and is used to organsise the structure and searching strategy.
Topic
          This clas represents a subtopic DMTL element and is used to organsise the structure and searching strategy.
WordGraph
          WordGraph is responsible for building word graphs from text stimulus and matching these graphs against text stimulus.
 

Classes in metaface.interaction used by metaface.server
InteractionManager
          This class handles all interaction within a MetaFace application.
